Package com.linkedin.venice.helix

Class HelixReadOnlySchemaRepositoryAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.linkedin.venice.helix.HelixReadOnlySchemaRepositoryAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReadOnlySchemaRepository, VeniceResource
public class HelixReadOnlySchemaRepositoryAdapter extends Object implements ReadOnlySchemaRepository
This repository provides the read-only access to both system stores and regular stores.

      public int getValueSchemaId(String storeName, String valueSchemaStr)
      Description copied from interface: ReadOnlySchemaRepository
      Return the schema ID of any schema that has the same parsing canonical form as the schema provided. If multiple schemas have the same parsing canonical form, return the one with the largest ID.

    • getSupersetSchema

      public SchemaEntry getSupersetSchema(String storeName)
      Description copied from interface: ReadOnlySchemaRepository
      Get the superset value schema for a given store. Each store has at most one active superset schema. Specifically a store must have some features enabled (e.g. read compute, write compute) to have a superset value schema which evolves as new value schemas are added.
      Specified by:
      getSupersetSchema in interface ReadOnlySchemaRepository
      Returns:
      Superset value schema or null if store does not have any superset value schema.

    • getDerivedSchemaId

      public GeneratedSchemaID getDerivedSchemaId(String storeName, String derivedSchemaStr)
      Description copied from interface: ReadOnlySchemaRepository
      Look up derived schema id and its corresponding value schema id by given store name and derived schema. This is likely used by clients that write to Venice
      Specified by:
      getDerivedSchemaId in interface ReadOnlySchemaRepository
      Returns:
      a pair where the first value is value schema id and the second value is derived schema id
